title: Ep. 106 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description:
SPONSORS: - Get an extra $50 off sitewide, on top of their Biggest Sale of the Year when you go to https://Kamikoto.com/CAVE and use the offer code CAVE - Go to https://3Chi.com and use code BEARS at checkout to receive 5% off your order - Get three extra months free at https://ExpressVPN.com/CAVE - Go to https://Squarespace.com for a free trial and when you’re ready to launch, use the offer code BEARS to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain - Go to https://WHOOP.com and use code “CAVE” at checkout to save yourself 15% off today. - Go to https://HelloFresh.com/CAVE14 and use code CAVE14 for up to 14 free meals AND 3 free gifts! - Get 10% off your first month of online therapy at https://BetterHelp.com/BEARS.

Today is a very special episode of 2 Bears, 1 Cave with Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer recorded out of G-Bay Studios! We try to find the origin of Bert getting fat, figure out how many times Bert dumped in his pants, and gaslighting. The bears then talk about the whole situation revolving around the new Dave Chappelle special, Hannah Gadsby, and Netflix. Bert has the epiphany that he should be dressing privately on the road, which turns into a whole thing.
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
